channel.title: [PI]Items on death
channel.description: Whenever my players die in the wildy and/or in pvp or by pvm, they lose items of more value, and items of less value are kept. so say for exmaple, they are fighting with full bandos on, with rune in the inventory, if that player should die, they lose the bandos and keep the rune. or if they are fighting in rune, and have bandos in the inventory, they lose the bandos. How can I reverse it, so they lose the less valuable items when they die, and keep the more valuable items?

item.title: [PI]Items on death
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

it’s alright, can anyone else maybe help then?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Items on death
item.dc:creator: @ii_bandos_ii ii bandos ii
item.description:
@ii_bandos_ii wrote:

[quote=“blo0d pker, post:1, topic:385839”]Whenever my players die in the wildy and/or in pvp or by pvm, they lose items of more value, and items of less value are kept.
so say for exmaple, they are fighting with full bandos on, with rune in the inventory, if that player should die, they lose the bandos and keep the rune.
or if they are fighting in rune, and have bandos in the inventory, they lose the bandos. How can I reverse it, so they lose the less valuable items when they die, and keep the more valuable items?[/quote]
what i think is the rune cost more then your bandos on your server but you can change that fast at the file config click on item.cfg and then search let’s say Bandos_tassets then sometine like this will pop up item = 1077 Bandos_tassets Big,_black_and_heavy_looking. 1000000 1000000 1000000 0 0 0 -21 -7 80 80 73 -4 80 2 1
do you see where it say’s 1000000 1000000 1000000 change all 3 of them to how much u want them to be worth so if you want them to be 500mill you would do this item = 1077 Bandos_tassets Big,_black_and_heavy_looking. 500000000 500000000 500000000 0 0 0 -21 -7 80 80 73 -4 80 2 1 I hope this helped you

Oh and btw also search for rune_platebody and check how much it cost and lower the price down if u want to

Read full topic
